ORDER BY T.SCREEN_GRANT_NO

sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SY_LOGIN_SCREEN ( SCREEN_GRANT_NO, SCREEN_GRANT_ID, SCREEN_GRANT_NAME, SCREEN_GRANT_EN_NAME, DESCRIPTION, CREATE_DATE, CREATED_BY, ORDERNO, ACTIVITY, CPNY_ID) VALUES( #SCREEN_GRANT_NO:NUMERIC# , #SCREEN_GRANT_ID:VARCHAR# , #SCREEN_GRANT_NAME:VARCHAR# , #SCREEN_GRANT_EN_NAME:VARCHAR# , #DESCRIPTION:VARCHAR# , SYSDATE , #CREATED_BY:VARCHAR# , #ORDERNO:NUMERIC# , #ACTIVITY:NUMERIC# , #CPNY_ID:VARCHAR# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SY_LOGIN_SCREEN SET SCREEN_GRANT_NAME = #SCREEN_GRANT_NAME:VARCHAR# , SCREEN_GRANT_EN_NAME = #SCREEN_GRANT_EN_NAME:VARCHAR# , DESCRIPTION = #DESCRIPTION:VARCHAR# , UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE, UPDATED_BY = #UPDATED_BY:VARCHAR# , CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID:VARCHAR# , ACTIVITY =#ACTIVITY:NUMERIC# , ORDERNO =#ORDERNO:NUMERIC# WHERE SCREEN_GRANT_ID = #SCREEN_GRANT_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SY_SCREEN_GRANT (SCREEN_CODE, SCREEN_GRANT_ID, SELECTR, SAVER, INSERTR, UPDATER, DELETER, CANCELR, CREATE_DATE, CREATED_BY, ACTIVITY) SELECT A.MENU_CODE, #SCREEN_GRANT_ID:VARCHAR# , 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SYSDATE,#CREATED_BY:VARCHAR# , 1 FROM SY_MENU A WHERE A.ACTIVITY = 1 AND A.MENU_CODE IN( (SELECT C.MENU_CODE FROM SY_MENU C WHERE C.ACTIVITY = 1 AND C.MENU_CODE NOT IN (SELECT B.SCREEN_CODE FROM SY_SCREEN_GRANT B,SY_LOGIN_SCREEN D WHERE B.SCREEN_GRANT_ID = D.SCREEN_GRANT_ID AND B.SCREEN_GRANT_ID = #SCREEN_GRANT_ID:VARCHAR#) START WITH C.MENU_NO = #MENU_NO# CONNECT BY PRIOR C.MENU_CODE = C.MENU_PARENT_CODE)) START WITH A.MENU_NO = #MENU_NO# CONNECT BY PRIOR A.MENU_CODE = A.MENU_PARENT_CODE ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.ORDERNO
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SY_SCREEN_GRANT SET SELECTR = DECODE(#MENU_TAG#,'S',#FLAG#,SELECTR), SAVER = DECODE(#MENU_TAG#,'B',#FLAG#,SAVER), INSERTR = DECODE(#MENU_TAG#,'I',#FLAG#,INSERTR), UPDATER = DECODE(#MENU_TAG#,'U',#FLAG#,UPDATER), DELETER = DECODE(#MENU_TAG#,'D',#FLAG#,DELETER), CANCELR = DECODE(#MENU_TAG#,'C',#FLAG#,CANCELR), UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE, UPDATED_BY = #UPDATED_BY:VARCHAR# WHERE SCREEN_GRANT_ID = #SCREEN_GRANT_ID:VARCHAR# AND SCREEN_CODE IN ( SELECT C.MENU_CODE FROM SY_MENU C WHERE C.ACTIVITY = 1 START WITH C.MENU_NO = #MENU_NO# CONNECT BY PRIOR C.MENU_CODE = C.MENU_PARENT_CODE )
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE SY_SCREEN_GRANT

SELECT A.MENU_CODE, A.MENU_NO, A.MENU_INTRO, NVL(A.MENU_EN_INTRO, ' ') AS MENU_EN_INTRO, A.DEPTH, B.SCREEN_GRANT_ID, NVL(B.SELECTR, 0) AS SELECTR, NVL(B.SAVER, 0) AS SAVER, NVL(B.INSERTR, 0) AS INSERTR, NVL(B.UPDATER, 0) AS UPDATER, NVL(B.DELETER, 0) AS DELETER, NVL(B.CANCELR, 0) AS CANCELR, A.MENU_PARENT_CODE FROM (SELECT T.MENU_CODE, T.MENU_NO, DECODE(T.DEPTH,0,T.MENU_INTRO,1,'  '||T.MENU_INTRO,2,'    '||T.MENU_INTRO,'') MENU_INTRO, DECODE(T.DEPTH,0,T.MENU_EN_INTRO,1,'  '||T.MENU_EN_INTRO,2,'    '||T.MENU_EN_INTRO,'') MENU_EN_INTRO, T.MENU_PARENT_CODE, T.DEPTH + 1 DEPTH, ROWNUM RN FROM SY_MENU T WHERE T.ACTIVITY = 1 AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
START WITH T.MENU_CODE = #MENU_CODE#
START WITH T.MENU_PARENT_CODE = 'HRMS'
CONNECT BY PRIOR T.MENU_CODE = T.MENU_PARENT_CODE ORDER SIBLINGS BY T.ORDERNO) A, SY_SCREEN_GRANT B WHERE A.MENU_CODE = B.SCREEN_CODE(+)
B.SCREEN_GRANT_ID(+) = #SCREEN_GRANT_ID:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY $sortname$ $sortorder$
ORDER BY RN

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT T.MENU_CODE, T.MENU_NO, T.MENU_INTRO, NVL(T.MENU_EN_INTRO, ' ') AS MENU_EN_INTRO, T.MENU_PARENT_CODE, T.DEPTH, ROWNUM RN FROM SY_MENU T WHERE T.ACTIVITY = 1 AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
START WITH T.MENU_CODE = #MENU_CODE#
START WITH T.MENU_PARENT_CODE = 'HRMS'
CONNECT BY PRIOR T.MENU_CODE = T.MENU_PARENT_CODE ORDER SIBLINGS BY T.ORDERNO) A, SY_SCREEN_GRANT B WHERE A.MENU_CODE = B.SCREEN_CODE(+) AND B.SCREEN_GRANT_ID(+) = #SCREEN_GRANT_ID:VARCHAR#

SELECT T.MENU_NO, T.MENU_CODE, DECODE(T.DEPTH,0,T.MENU_INTRO,1,'  '||T.MENU_INTRO,2,'    '||T.MENU_INTRO,'') MENU_INTRO, DECODE(T.DEPTH,0,T.MENU_EN_INTRO,1,'  '||T.MENU_EN_INTRO,2,'    '||T.MENU_EN_INTRO,'') MENU_EN_INTRO, T.MENU_PARENT_CODE, T.DESCRIPTION, GET_SY_SCREEN_FLAG(#SCREEN_GRANT_ID:VARCHAR#,'S',T.MENU_CODE) AS SELECTR, GET_SY_SCREEN_FLAG(#SCREEN_GRANT_ID:VARCHAR#,'B',T.MENU_CODE) AS SAVER, GET_SY_SCREEN_FLAG(#SCREEN_GRANT_ID:VARCHAR#,'I',T.MENU_CODE) AS INSERTR, GET_SY_SCREEN_FLAG(#SCREEN_GRANT_ID:VARCHAR#,'U',T.MENU_CODE) AS UPDATER, GET_SY_SCREEN_FLAG(#SCREEN_GRANT_ID:VARCHAR#,'D',T.MENU_CODE) AS DELETER, GET_SY_SCREEN_FLAG(#SCREEN_GRANT_ID:VARCHAR#,'C',T.MENU_CODE) AS CANCELR, T.DEPTH + 1 DEPTH FROM SY_MENU T WHERE T.ACTIVITY = 1 AND T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
T.MENU_CODE LIKE #MENU_CODE# || '%'
